subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight--Bruce
author: Robin Searcy Henson
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0021_01C86856.C34033E0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Thank you Juli.

Robin


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: juli velaz=
quez<mailto:ghostchasingfool@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mail=
to:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Tuesday, February 05, 2008 8:53 PM
  S=
ubject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight--Bruce



  Robin:
            =
 I don't think you motives are selfish at all.  I am a firm believer that e=
verything happens for a reason and that people are brought into your life f=
or a purpose as well.  You are lead down certain paths, some which you have=
 not clue as how they came about, but nevertheless your on that road. 

   =
           I truly feel that the otherside knows of the sincere dedication =
of many in this group (for the files prove this) and hope the best is yet t=
o come. There are a lot of new comers to box research and hope that with ev=
eryones contributions we will all be able to get some of the answers we see=
k as well as reconnected with our loved ones who have gone before us.

    =
         Juli

  Robin Searcy Henson <MudPuddleFarm@...> wrote:
    I v=
ery much value and appreciate everyone participating in this forum.   My se=
lfish motive in wanting to contact the other side is my hope to hear from l=
oved ones who have passed.  I couldn't admit this a couple of years ago bec=
ause the idea of being contacted by my dead parents terrified me.  Now I lo=
ng for it.  I believe guardian angels have intervened on my behalf in the p=
ast and continue to watch over me.  I've had mystic experiences during time=
s of crisis that make me know a spiritual world exists.  How wonderful it m=
ust be to hear their voices first hand!  I'll remind myself every day never=
 to take any of what happens for granted.

    Robin

      ----- Original =
Message ----- 
      From: bruce halliday<mailto:paranormalinvestigating@ho=
tmail.com> 
      To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com<mailto:evp-itc@...=
m> 
      Sent: Monday, February 04, 2008 6:58 AM
      Subject: RE: [EVP-I=
TC] Re: File from tonight--Bruce


      Robin,
       
      I very much a=
ppreciate your comments and confidence in me, but at the end of the day I'm=
 no different than anyone else.
      The only thing that may set me apart =
from some of the other researchers here is that I have a bit more experienc=
e and 
      being disabled allows me a lot more time for research. I am al=
ways willing and hopefully able to help new researchers with 
      my advi=
ce and knowledge I have gained through experience. But my ideology is not t=
he end all explanation or truth of box research
      all opinions here are=
 valuable and deserving of consideration and attention.
       
      As fo=
r your question, the fact that I am blessed enough to receive a fairly good=
 level of communication I believe is based once 
      again on the relatio=
nship I have built with my tech/guides and the synchronization of energy we=
 have developed.
      The level of communication we are at I believe is on=
ly the very tip of the iceberg. My goal in "MY" research is to reach a leve=
l of communication that 
      allows us to speak easily and freely with ou=
r spirit friends in a fluid and continual fashion as if having a pleasant t=
elephone conversation.
       
      The gist of the messages I am receivin=
g now are directed toward our spirit counterparts achieving the same goal. =
It is already a comfort to me to know they are there and I have had the opp=
ortunity to speak with close family members and friends that have crossed o=
ver. And also recently Ms. Sarah Estep who has made the transition and is b=
eginning to work now on the
      spirit side to further the communication.=
 Any information I receive from the spirits I recognise to be friends is in=
valuable. Something as simple as a yes or no answer to a direct question th=
at has just been asked is a small miracle in and of itself. considering how=
 it was attained and where it is from. Most researchers I think after a cer=
tain amount of time succumb to the human flaw of complacency and take for g=
ranted that when they turn a box on they will receive communication. They l=
oose site of the fact that this communication is a precious gift to mankind=
 and eventually will change the way we perceive life and death.
       
   =
   I don't know if my thinking or opinions are lucid or the rantings of a m=
ad man, I'm sure a lot of people would say both. For what it is worth this =
is how I believe on the questions you asked.
      for better or worse.
   =
    
      Bruce



      Bruce Halliday 


      <http://free-paranormalin=
vestigating.com/%3C/div%3E%3C/div%3E%3Cp%20/%3E%3Cdiv%20class=3D>



------=
------------------------------------------------------------------
        =
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
        From: MudPuddleFarm@...
        Dat=
e: Sun, 3 Feb 2008 18:35:14 -0800
        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: File f=
rom tonight--Bruce


        It's always refreshing to read your input Bruc=
e.  Funny thing is, I recognize Mike and Lisa on your recordings too.  I'm =
aware that they are acting as facilitators and guardians, that they are con=
sistent in their ability to use varied modes of communication, and that the=
ir contact appears to be purposeful, as compared to so much that seems to h=
ave no rhyme or reason.  

        As a newbie I'm admittedly intimidated b=
y and in awe of the results you more experienced researchers are accomplish=
ing.  What I find most awesome is that everyone can have different methods,=
 belief systems and opinions and come together in one forum to share and le=
arn from one another.  I feel so lucky to have found you!  Bruce, your abil=
ity to hear and accurately repeat my one posted EVP is the only validation =
I've personally ever received that makes me know I'm involved in something =
real and life altering.  I'm supposed to be here!  I think a big part of my=
 education will continue to come from the knowledge and experience you all =
are willing to keep sharing.  It's also a fact that each of us needs to fin=
d his/her own individual truth.  

        I'm still troubled by the possib=
ility that we could be pawns in Someone Else's science experiment.  I can s=
ense Frank's cynicism related to the messages being meaningless and the mes=
sengers being untrustworthy.  In your own case, what is the goal?  Is the f=
act that you've established communication and continue to communicate enoug=
h?  Are we hoping to gain invaluable information from our guides, or just t=
o have the comfort of knowing they are there?  

        This is the week I=
've promised myself to start doing sessions with the Radio Shack hacks!  

=
        Robin





        hoogroups.com<mailto:myself.@yahoogroups.com> 
 =
         Sent: Sunday, February 03, 2008 6:25 AM
          Subject: RE: [EV=
P-ITC] Re: File from tonight


          Robin,
           
          I agr=
ee with Steve on a couple of points. First let me say that I
          do b=
elieve that we all have a "technician/guide/guardian" call them what you
  =
        may. but I usually call them by the names they introduced themselve=
s by.
           
          I know for a fact through many, many, many box =
sessions that when I turn
          a box on, could be Frank's box or the m=
inibox or the RS 470 does not matter which.
           
          The same =
two entities will come through immediately, So much so now, that I do not e=
ven ask for conformation that
          it is in fact them. I recognise the=
ir individual voice patterns. I have built a solid relationship with these =
two spirits
          I know as mike and Lisa so much so that I have even g=
otten to know their individual personalities.
           
          There a=
re other newer researchers here that will attest to the fact that when they=
 where doing their first sessions
          I had asked my two "Friends" Mi=
ke and Lisa to assist in getting them started and invariably the spirits th=
at came 
          through to these new researchers during their first sess=
ions identified themselves as Mike and Lisa.
           
          Steve sa=
ys he does not turn on his box and use them as a crutch, that is not entire=
ly true. I had done research 
          very closely with Steve until recen=
tly and I would venture to say that 99% if not every session he starts with=
 "Mike & Lisa
          are you available to talk with me" 
           
   =
       Also I don't consider working with my technicians as using them as a=
 crutch, They would not allow that.
          They are not there like butle=
rs at our beckoned call when we feel they may be of some use.
          Qui=
te the opposite, without them we would get no communication at all, they ar=
e allowing us the honor of receiving this 
          celestial communicatio=
n. They are the moderators, facilitators and generators of all we hear and =
send to and from the spirit realm.
          And they also stand as guards =
and protectors to do the best they can to keep us from being deceived or ta=
ken down a dark path.
           
          Some here wait for others to st=
ate an opinion and then tend to agree with that opinion no matter what they=
 have experienced to be true.
           
          Robin, my advice to you=
 as a new researcher in this field. Form your own beliefs through your expe=
rience and research.
          Listen and learn from others but do not let =
what you believe to be true or not, be swayed by popular opinion.
         =
  
          Bruce



          Bruce Halliday 


          <http://free-pa=
ranormalinvestigating.com/%3C/div%3E%3C/div%3E%3Cp%20/%3E%3Cdiv%20class=3D>=

          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
            From: MudPuddleFarm@msn.c=
om
            Date: Sat, 2 Feb 2008 21:42:09 -0800
            Subject: Re=
: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight


            Steve,

            I certa=
inly appreciate your thoughts.  In the back of my mind is always the questi=
on of whether we are being Deceived.  Just for the sake of argument, is it =
POSSIBLE we're being manipulated by something evil?  I'm not frightened, an=
d I won't stop my own research (the negative stuff just makes me more deter=
mined), but my mind does go there sometimes.  I hope that along with develo=
ping my "ear" I can acquire the gift of discernment.

            Robin


 =
             ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: Steve Hultay=
<mailto:urkel23@...> 
              To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:=
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
              Sent: Saturday, February 02, 2008 8=
:57 PM
              Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight:


          =
    Robin,

              If i may add my thoughts on this: There is no con=
crete evidence of 
              who or what comes through is what they say=
 they are. Technicians i 
              have found were used to get you up =
and running and i only now call on 
              them if i need assistance=
. I don't turn the boxes on and ask for 
              them like a crutch, =
i conduct my session and if i need help they will 
              supply it =
to me if needed. I think the whole idea is to find out who 
              w=
e are communicating with, maybe we will never really know for sure 
       =
       but i still try and find out as best as i can. 

              -Stev=
e H.

              --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps.com>, "Robin Searcy Henson" 
              <MudPuddleFarm@...> wrote:
  =
            >
              > Hi Frank, 
              > 
              > W=
hen you mention being distrustful of what comes through the boxes, 
       =
       are you saying you're skeptical of the "technicians" being who they =

              say they are? Not trying to open another can of worms here, =
just 
              wanting to continue learning from your experience and r=
esearch. I 
              get what you're saying about becoming obsessive w=
ith the sessions. 
              I've probably asked you this a half dozen =
times over the last couple 
              of years, but who or what do YOU =
think you're/we're communicating 
              with?
              > 
    =
          > Robin
              > 
              > 
              > ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
              > From: purplespacefriend<mailto:purpl=
ealiengirl@...> 
              > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com><mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups=
.com>> 
              > Sent: Saturday, February 02, 2008 7:46 PM
         =
     > Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight
              > 
          =
    > 
              > Have ya tried EVPmaker? It is based on that random p=
rinciple, and 
              > predates the boxes.
              > 
       =
       > I've heard this stuff before, about random being the best, and I 
=
              > have to disaggree. I also think it unwise to spend every wa=
king 
              > moment doing sessions. I think it creates that expect=
ation, and 
              > perhaps desperation to make contact, and I woul=
d tend not to 
              trust 
              > what comes through. 
  =
            > 
              > I don't trust some of this stuff because I h=
ave yet get any 
              > meaningful assistence with the boxes from =
the so called 
              technicians. 
              > All I ever got w=
as a telepathic "suggestion" to use the echo 
              boxes. 
       =
       > Everything else was a assemblage of stuff I had worked on in hte 
=
              past 
              > to solve the problem of "what else coul=
d I use". 
              > 
              > I hate to see yet another go do=
wn the road of "this is the 
              onlyest 
              > way". 
=
              > 
              > Frank-S
              >

          <DIV>Robin,<BR> <BR>I agree with Steve on a=
 couple of points. 
          First let me say that I<BR>do believe that we=
 all have a 
          "technician/<WBR>guide/guardian" call them what you<=
BR>may. but I 
          usually call them by the names they introduced the=
mselves 
          by.<BR> <BR>I know for a fact through many, many, m=
any box 
          sessions that when I turn<BR>a box on, could be Frank's =
box or the 
          minibox or the RS 470 does not matter which.<BR>&nbsp=
;<BR>The same two 
          entities will come through immediately, So muc=
h so now, that I do not 
          even ask for conformation that<BR>it is =
in fact them. I recognise 
          their individual voice patterns. I hav=
e built a solid relationship 
          with these two spirits<BR>I know as=
 mike and Lisa so much so that I 
          have even gotten to know their =
individual 
          personalities.<BR> <BR>There are other newer res=
earchers here 
          that will attest to the fact that when they where =
doing their first 
          sessions<BR>I had asked my two "Friends" Mike =
and Lisa to assist in 
          getting them started and invariably the sp=
irits that came <BR>through 
          to these new researchers during thei=
r first sessions identified 
          themselves as Mike and Lisa.<BR>&nbs=
p;<BR>Steve says he does not turn 
          on his box and use them as a c=
rutch, that is not entirely true. I had 
          done research <BR>very c=
losely with Steve until recently and I would 
          venture to say that=
 99% if not every session he starts with "Mike 
          & Lisa<BR>are=
 you available to talk with me" <BR> <BR>Also I 
          don't consi=
der working with my technicians as using them as a crutch, 
          They =
would not allow that.<BR>They are not there like butlers at our 
          =
beckoned call when we feel they may be of some use.<BR>Quite the 
         =
 opposite, without them we would get no communication at all, they are 
   =
       allowing us the honor of receiving this <BR>celestial communication.=
 
          They are the moderators, facilitators and generators of all we =
hear 
          and send to and from the spirit realm.<BR>And they also sta=
nd as 
          guards and protectors to do the best they can to keep us f=
rom being 
          deceived or taken down a dark path.<BR> <BR>Some =
here wait for 
          others to state an opinion and then tend to agree =
with that opinion no 
          matter what they have experienced to be tru=
e.<BR> <BR>Robin, my 
          advice to you as a new researcher in t=
his field. Form your own beliefs 
          through your experience and res=
earch.<BR>Listen and learn from others 
          but do not let what you b=
elieve to be true or not, be swayed by 
          popular opinion.<BR>&nbsp=
;<BR>Bruce<BR><BR><BR>
